text: The Bavarian or Munich Soviet Republic (; Bavarian: Mingara Räterepublik, Boarische Räterepublik)Hooglund, Eric James (1966) The Munich Soviet Republic of April, 1919. Orono, Maine: University of MaineMitchell, Allan (1965) Revolution in Bavaria, 1918-1919: The Eisner Regime and the Soviet Republic. Princeton, New Jersey: Princeton University Press. p.346. Hollander, Neil (2013) Elusive Dove: The Search for Peace During World War I. McFarland. p.283, note 269. was a socialist state mostly in Munich, Bavaria. == References == Category:1919 establishments in Germany Category:20th-century disestablishments in Germany Category:1910s disestablishments in Europe Category:1919 disestablishments in Europe Category:Former states in Germany Category:Former socialist republics Category:Former dictatorships Category:20th century in Munich Category:States and territories established in the 20th century Category:States and territories disestablished in the 20th century
title: Bavarian Soviet Republic
